headline: Will FactoryTalk Design Workbench Cement Rockwell Automation’s (ROK) Edge in Digital Transformation?
summary: Rockwell Automation recently launched FactoryTalk Design Workbench, a free design software aimed at streamlining programming, configuration, and troubleshooting for micro control systems, especially those using Micro800 controllers. This release highlights Rockwell's ongoing commitment to broadening digital tools for machine builders and manufacturers, underscoring its efforts to bolster efficiency and flexibility within automation workflows. Let's examine how the introduction of FactoryTalk...

headline: Hayward Holdings, Inc. (HAYW) Beats Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Hayward Holdings (HAYW) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +16.67% and +5.55%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
